pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.11_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo yānena yāyissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.1.15_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti, na sakkoti padasā gantuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.4_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:1.2.5.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā yānena yāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.1.10_0: vayhaṁ ratho sakaṭaṁ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkī.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.1_0: Agilānā agilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.2_0: Agilānā vematikā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc85:2.2.3_0: Agilānā gilānasaññā yānena yāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
